--- title: "Sheffield Man Of Steel" date: "2011-07-26" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2011-07-26_SHEFFIELD_MAN_OF_STEEL/img/01.png categories: [race report, obstacle race] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2011-07-26_SHEFFIELD_MAN_OF_STEEL/img/01.png) This race was a precursor of times. Established well before things like Total Warriors, Spartan Race, or Tough Mudder became extremely popular and famous, it was an extremely well organized and fun race. A lot of fun and varied obstacles, this was the first edition of the race. The harder obstacle I remember was the one where we had to climb up an almost vertical drop with the aid of a rope. It must have been 50m, 80m top, but it was extremely slippery and challenging. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {layout-ncol=4} ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2011-07-26_SHEFFIELD_MAN_OF_STEEL/img/00.png){ width="100" group="hi" } ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2011-07-26_SHEFFIELD_MAN_OF_STEEL/img/01.png){ width="100" group="hi" } ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport_small/2011-07-26_SHEFFIELD_MAN_OF_STEEL/img/02.jpg){ width="100" group="hi" } :::
